vector< Token > tokens

Detailed Description

An RPN Boolean expression.

This class represents an RPN Boolean expression. This is simply a list of Tokens.

Definition at line 21 of file Expression.h.

Definition at line 27 of file Expression.h.

References tokens.

Expression::Expression (  const string &  s  ) 
 

Create an expression from a string.

This is the standard constructor. It reads through a string, converting each character to a token. Invalid tokens are skipped.

Parameters:
s the string to convert into tokens.

Definition at line 10 of file Expression.cc.

References tokens, and Token::valid().

Member Function Documentation

bool Expression::check (   )  const
 

Check the syntax.

This procedure checks the syntax of an expression. An expression such as x** is incorrect.

Returns:
true if the syntax of the expression is OK.
